EmailTemplate.description: Send customer a url link to e-NDA form for accounts outside America
EmailTemplate.name: Contact: e-NDA link with Letterhead
EmailTemplate.subject: u-blox AG: Non-Disclosure and Restricted Use Agreement (NDA) with u-blox AG
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please find below the link to the standard mutual NDA with u-blox AG:
https://www.u-blox.com/en/non-disclosure-agreement?ub_contact__c={!User.Alias}
Under this link, you will be able to fill in a web form and to agree to the terms of the NDA by validly submitting the form.
We thank you and send you our best regards,
u-blox AG ZÃ¼rcherstrasse 68 8800 Thalwil Switzerland
Phone: +41 44 722 74 44 Fax: +41 44 722 74 47 Email: info@u-blox.com
